## Bio

Carlos is a PhD student in Epidemiology at the University of Washington School of Public Health. Interested in causal inference methods applied on observational studies and randomized trials under time-variant settings. Currently applying causal inference methods on a cluster-randomized trial addressing PrEP initiation in Kenya.

## Education
PhD 2022-Present, Department of Epidemiology, University of Washington, USA.

MSPH 2022, Rollins School of Public Health, Emory University, USA.

MD 2017, National University of Piura, Peru.
